Class ApptSummaryReportController

java.lang.Object
controller.ApptSummaryReportController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ApptSummaryReportController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the GUI elements of appt_summary_report.fxml.
